meanings.definition: The act of making an action or process easier or more efficient.
meanings.sent1: The facilitation of the meeting helped everyone understand the topic better.
meanings.sent2: Her facilitation of the project streamlined the workflow.
meanings.sent3: The facilitation of the game made it more fun for everyone involved.
meanings.sent4: His facilitation of the negotiations smoothed out the process like butter on toast.
meanings.sent5: The facilitation of the event made it a breeze for all attendees.

meanings.definition: The act of helping or assisting in a process or activity.
meanings.sent1: The facilitation of the training session ensured everyone learned the new skills.
meanings.sent2: Their facilitation of the event made it run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The facilitation of the bake sale made it a sweet success.
meanings.sent4: Her facilitation of the group project was like being guided by a friendly tour guide.
meanings.sent5: The facilitation of the charity event brought joy to many in need.
